title: Privacy Act of 1974
summary: U.S. federal law governing the collection, maintenance, use, and dissemination of personal information by federal agencies.

title: GDPR Article 5
summary: Principles relating to processing of personal data including lawfulness, fairness, transparency, data minimization, and integrity.

title: CISA Reporting Guidance
summary: Guidelines for reporting cybersecurity incidents to the Cybersecurity and Infrastructure Security Agency.
